leo_protocol.name: EHG_Engineer LEO Protocol System

database.name: ehg_engineer
database.purpose: Stores LEO Protocol data: Strategic Directives, Agent States, Handoffs, Evidence, etc.

leo_protocol.description: This database powers the LEO Protocol tool itself

ehg.name: EHG Application

database.name: ehg
database.purpose: The actual EHG application database with user data, ventures, portfolio, etc.

ehg.description: The portfolio application being built using LEO Protocol

important_note: NEVER confuse ehg_engineer (the tool) with ehg (the project)
